info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio - Numbers

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Bundles for an account.

parameters.description: The verification status of the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The unique string of a regulation that is associated to the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: RegulationSid

parameters.description: The ISO country code of the Bundle's phone number country ownership request.
parameters.name: IsoCountry

parameters.description: The type of phone number of the Bundle's ownership request.
parameters.name: NumberType

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

Email.description: The email address that will receive updates when the Bundle resource changes status.

EndUserType.description: The type of End User of the Bundle resource.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

IsoCountry.description: The ISO country code of the Bundle's phone number country ownership request.

NumberType.description: The type of phone number of the Bundle's ownership request.

RegulationSid.description: The unique string of a regulation that is associated to the Bundle resource.

StatusCallback.description: The URL we call to inform your application of status changes.

get.description: Retrieve a list of Evaluations associated to the Bundle resource.

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: BundleSid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the Evaluation resource.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Assigned Items for an account.

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: BundleSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: BundleSid

ObjectSid.description: The SID of an object bag that holds information of the different items.

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: BundleSid

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Identity resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: BundleSid

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Identity resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: Sid

post.description: Updates a Bundle in an account.

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.
parameters.name: Sid

Email.description: The email address that will receive updates when the Bundle resource changes status.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

Status.description: The verification status of the Bundle resource.

StatusCallback.description: The URL we call to inform your application of status changes.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all End-User Types.

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

get.description: Fetch a specific End-User Type Instance.

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the End-User Type resource.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Retrieve a list of all End User for an account.

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

Attributes.description: The set of parameters that are the attributes of the End User resource which are derived End User Types.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

Type.description: The type of end user of the Bundle resource - can be `individual` or `business`.

parameters.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the End User resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the End User resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the End User resource.
parameters.name: Sid

Attributes.description: The set of parameters that are the attributes of the End User resource which are derived End User Types.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Regulations.

parameters.description: The type of End User the regulation requires - can be `individual` or `business`.
parameters.name: EndUserType

parameters.description: The ISO country code of the phone number's country.
parameters.name: IsoCountry

parameters.description: The type of phone number that the regulatory requiremnt is restricting.
parameters.name: NumberType

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the Regulation resource.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Supporting Document Types.

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

get.description: Fetch a specific Supporting Document Type Instance.

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the Supporting Document Type resource.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Supporting Document for an account.

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

Attributes.description: The set of parameters that are the attributes of the Supporting Documents resource which are derived Supporting Document Types.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

Type.description: The type of the Supporting Document.

parameters.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the Supporting Document resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the Supporting Document resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the Supporting Document resource.
parameters.name: Sid

Attributes.description: The set of parameters that are the attributes of the Supporting Document resource which are derived Supporting Document Types.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
